title: Just an Average Gold V Jungler Looking for love
body:
Hi guys, I'm gold 5 ,Mostly a jungler, can play top and mid to a certain level, Just looking to climb with some nice people, 

Add my IGN: Formique

Anyone that helps me climb can get a reward, (Not my penis).

I take League seriously and just want to be apart of something serious, thanks guys and gals.

Love dad xx
